topic: User feedback review for knowledge assistant prototype
summary: Reviewed test feedback from 5 users. Main issues were slow retrieval speed and missing citations. Proposed to optimize embedding chunk size and improve re-ranking.
follow_ups: Grace will benchmark retrieval latency with smaller chunk embeddings.
Frank will update UI to display source citations.
action_items: Generate embeddings for 3 new document batches.
Add citation highlighting in answer output.

conversation.speaker: Grace
conversation.text: Reducing chunk size improved precision but increased query time.

conversation.speaker: Frank
conversation.text: Let's find a balance and re-test tomorrow.
